verses.verse: <S%G2076><s%> Now Is <S%G1161><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of Things Hoped For The <S%G1679><s%> Assurance, <S%G5287><s%> Of Things <S%G4229><s%> The Conviction <S%G1650><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Seen. <S%G991><s%>
<S%G1722><s%> <S%G3778><s%> For By This <S%G1063><s%> Were Borne Witness <S%G3140><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders. <S%G4245><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> We Apprehend <S%G3539><s%> To Have Been Framed <S%G2675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Worlds <S%G165><s%> By The Word <S%G4487><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> So That <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> From Things <S%G1537><s%> Appearing <S%G5316><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Seen <S%G991><s%> Have Being. <S%G1096><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> A More Excellent <S%G4119><s%> Sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> Abel <S%G6><s%> Than <S%G3844><s%> Cain <S%G2535><s%> Offered <S%G4374><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was Borne Witness To <S%G3140><s%> As Being <S%G1511><s%> Righteous, <S%G1342><s%> Bearing Witness <S%G3140><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1435><s%> His Gifts <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Having Died, <S%G599><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Speaks. <S%G2980><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Enoch <S%G1802><s%> Was Translated <S%G3346><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%>, Was Not Found, <S%G2147><s%> Because <S%G1360><s%> Translated <S%G3346><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G4253><s%> For Before <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3331><s%> His Translation <S%G846><s%> He Has Been Borne Witness To <S%G3140><s%> To Have Well Pleased <S%G2100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G5565><s%> But Apart From <S%G1161><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> It Is Impossible <S%G102><s%> To Well Please Him <S%G2100><s%> <S%G4100><s%> For To Believe <S%G1063><s%> It Behoves <S%G1163><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Approaches <S%G4334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> And That <S%G2532><s%> For Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Seek Out <S%G1567><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Rewarder <S%G3406><s%> He Becomes <S%G1096><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Having Been Divinely Instructed <S%G5537><s%> Noah <S%G3575><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Not Yet <S%G3369><s%> Seen, <S%G991><s%> Having Been Moved With Fear, <S%G2125><s%> Prepared <S%G2680><s%> An Ark <S%G2787><s%> For The <S%G1519><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of House <S%G3624><s%> His; <S%G846><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Condemned <S%G2632><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Heir. <S%G2818><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Being Called <S%G2564><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> Obeyed <S%G5219><s%> To Go Out <S%G1831><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was About <S%G3195><s%> To Receive <S%G2983><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> An Inheritance, <S%G2817><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out, <S%G1831><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Knowing <S%G1987><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> He Is Going. <S%G2064><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> He Sojourned <S%G3939><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Promise, <S%G1860><s%> As In <S%G5613><s%> A Strange Country, <S%G245><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Tents <S%G4633><s%> Having Dwelt <S%G2730><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Joint Heirs <S%G4789><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Same; <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1551><s%> For He Was Waiting For <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Foundations <S%G2310><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> Of Which The <S%G3739><s%> Artificer <S%G5079><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Constructor Is <S%G1217><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Herself <S%G846><s%> Sarah <S%G4564><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> For The <S%G1519><s%> Conception <S%G2602><s%> Of Seed <S%G4690><s%> Received, <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beyond <S%G3844><s%> Age <S%G2540><s%> Seasonable <S%G2244><s%>, Gave Birth; <S%G5088><s%> Since <S%G1893><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> She Esteemed <S%G2233><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Promised. <S%G1861><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Were Born, <S%G1080><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And That Too <S%G5023><s%> Of One Having Become Dead, <S%G3499><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stars <S%G798><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Multitude, <S%G4128><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5616><s%> Sand <S%G285><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shore <S%G5491><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Countless. <S%G382><s%>

In <S%G2596><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having Received <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promises, <S%G1860><s%> But <S%G235><s%> From Afar <S%G4207><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Having Seen, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Having Been Persuaded, <S%G3982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Embraced Them <S%G782><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Confessed <S%G3670><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Strangers <S%G3581><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sojourners <S%G3927><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> For They Who <S%G1063><s%> Such Things <S%G5108><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> Make Manifest <S%G1718><s%> That Their <S%G3754><s%> Own Country <S%G3968><s%> They Are Seeking. <S%G1934><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> They Were Remembering <S%G3421><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Whence <S%G3739><s%> They Came Out, <S%G1831><s%> <S%G2192><s%> They Might Have Had <S%G302><s%> Opportunity <S%G2540><s%> To Have Returned; <S%G344><s%>

<S%G3570><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> A Better <S%G2909><s%> They Stretch Forward To, <S%G3713><s%> ' <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076><s%> A Heavenly; <S%G2032><s%> Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Ashamed Of <S%G1870><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Be Called <S%G1941><s%> Their; <S%G846><s%> <S%G2090><s%> For He Prepared <S%G1063><s%> For Them <S%G846><s%> A City. <S%G4172><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Has Offered Up <S%G4374><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> Being Tried, <S%G3985><s%> And His <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Only Begotten <S%G3439><s%> Was Offering Up <S%G4374><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promises <S%G1860><s%> Accepted, <S%G324><s%>
As To <S%G4314><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2980><s%> It Was Said, <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> Shall Be Called <S%G2564><s%> Thy <S%G4671><s%> Seed; <S%G4690><s%>

Reckoning <S%G3049><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> To Raise <S%G1453><s%> Able Was <S%G1415><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Whence <S%G3606><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Simile <S%G3850><s%> He Received. <S%G2865><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Things Coming <S%G3195><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Esau. <S%G2269><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> Dying <S%G599><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Joseph <S%G2501><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Worshipped <S%G4352><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Top <S%G206><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4464><s%> Of His Staff. <S%G846><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> Dying, <S%G5053><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Going Forth <S%G1841><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel <S%G2474><s%> Made Mention, <S%G3421><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3747><s%> His Bones <S%G846><s%> Gave Command. <S%G1781><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> Having Been Born, <S%G1080><s%> Was Kid <S%G2928><s%> Three Months <S%G5150><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Parents <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G1360><s%> They Saw <S%G1492><s%> Beautiful <S%G791><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child; <S%G3813><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Fear <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Injunction <S%G1297><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> King. <S%G935><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Having Become, <S%G1096><s%> Refused <S%G720><s%> To Be Called <S%G3004><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Daughter <S%G2364><s%> Pharaoh's; <S%G5328><s%>

Rather <S%G3123><s%> Having Chosen <S%G138><s%> To Suffer Affliction With <S%G4778><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Than The <S%G2228><s%> Temporary <S%G4340><s%> To Have <S%G2192><s%> Of Sin <S%G266><s%> Enjoyment; <S%G619><s%>

Greater <S%G3173><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> Having Asteemed <S%G2233><s%> Then The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> Treasures <S%G2344><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Reproach <S%G3680><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> <S%G578><s%> For He Had Respect <S%G1063><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Recompense. <S%G3405><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> He Left <S%G2641><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having Feared <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Indignation <S%G2372><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> King; <S%G935><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Invisible One <S%G517><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Seeing <S%G3708><s%> He Persevered. <S%G2594><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> He Has Kept <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Affusion <S%G4378><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%> <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Destroyer Of <S%G3645><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Firstborn Ones <S%G4416><s%> Might Touch <S%G2345><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> They Passed Through <S%G1224><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Red <S%G2063><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Dry Land; <S%G3584><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> Trial <S%G3984><s%> Having Made <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Egyptians <S%G124><s%> Were Swallowed Up. <S%G2666><s%>
By Faith <S%G4102><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Walls <S%G5038><s%> Of Jericho <S%G2410><s%> Fell, <S%G4098><s%> Having Been Encircled <S%G2944><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>

By Faith <S%G4102><s%> Rahab <S%G4460><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harlot <S%G4204><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Did Perish With <S%G4881><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Disobeyed, <S%G544><s%> Having Received <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spies <S%G2685><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Peace. <S%G1515><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> More <S%G2089><s%> Do I Say? <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1952><s%> For Will Fail <S%G1063><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Relating <S%G1334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> Gideon, <S%G1066><s%> Barak <S%G913><s%> Also <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Samson <S%G4546><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jephthah, <S%G2422><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> Also <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Samuel <S%G4545><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets : <S%G4396><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Overcame <S%G2610><s%> Kingdoms, <S%G932><s%> Wrought <S%G2038><s%> Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> Obtained <S%G2013><s%> Promises, <S%G1860><s%> Stopped <S%G5420><s%> Mouths <S%G4750><s%> Of Lions, <S%G3023><s%>

Quenched The <S%G4570><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of Fire <S%G4442><s%> Escaped The <S%G5343><s%> Mouths <S%G4750><s%> Of The Sword, <S%G3162><s%> Acquired Strength <S%G1743><s%> Out Of <S%G575><s%> Weakness, <S%G769><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Mighty <S%G2478><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> War, The <S%G4171><s%> Armies <S%G3925><s%> Made To Give Way <S%G2827><s%> Of Strangers. <S%G245><s%>

Received <S%G2983><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3498><s%> Their Dead <S%G846><s%> <S%G243><s%> And Others <S%G1161><s%> Were Tortured, <S%G5178><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Having Accepted <S%G4327><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Redemption, <S%G629><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> A Better <S%G2909><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> They Might Obtain; <S%G5177><s%>

<S%G2087><s%> And Others <S%G1161><s%> Of Mockings <S%G1701><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Scourgings <S%G3148><s%> Trial <S%G3984><s%> Received, <S%G2983><s%> <S%G2089><s%> Yea, Moreover, <S%G1161><s%> Of Bonds <S%G1199><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Imprisonment. <S%G5438><s%>

They Were Stoned, <S%G3034><s%> Were Sawn Asunder, <S%G4249><s%>, Were Tempted, <S%G3985><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Slaughter <S%G5408><s%> Of The Sword <S%G3162><s%> They Died; <S%G599><s%> They Wandered <S%G4022><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sheep Skins, <S%G3374><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Goats ' <S%G122><s%> Skins, <S%G1192><s%> Being Destitute, <S%G5302><s%> Being Oppressed, <S%G2346><s%> Being Evil Treated, <S%G2558><s%>

Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Deserts <S%G2047><s%> Wandering <S%G4105><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In Mountains <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In Caves <S%G4693><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Holes <S%G3692><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> Having Been Borne Witness To <S%G3140><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Did Receive <S%G2865><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise, <S%G1860><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Better <S%G2909><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> Having Foreseen, <S%G4265><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> They Should Be Made Perfect. <S%G5048><s%>
